message: Let's start fair. I'll take 90% and you can have 10%. This is a good start, Bob!
Let's flip the script. I'll take 95%, and you can have the remaining 5%. This is a fair compromise after your initial offer.
I understand you want more, Bob, but I'm willing to compromise. Let's split it 80/20 this time. It's a better deal than your offer, and we can both walk away with something.
